ygData.subject: Re: Got to 34
ygData.msgSnippet: I would not solo specs until you are at least 2 shades of blue over them. They are mean critters, and if your first darkness/fear spell does not stick, you may
ygData.messageBody:
I would not solo specs until you are at least 2 shades of blue over them.
They are mean critters, and if your first darkness/fear spell does not
stick, you may not get another chance.

You are far better off soloing Vhalen at the well in SK.





At 08:35 AM 12/22/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>
>
> > lastnight I made 34 :)
> >
> > Spectres and SG are now even or yellow, and I was hoping someone here has
> > solo'd spectres in oasis before... and could tell me a couple of tips :)
>
>Congrats! :)
>
>As far as specs in Oasis go, you should be able to solo one...however you
>can't pull singles off the island until you hit 46 or so. So until you can
>do that safely, avoid being the only one fighting them as it's rather rude
>to kite one then train the rest of the island to zone everytime ;) a nice
>darkness/fear/pet combo will finish one off easily, as with any outdoor mob.
>Just get one to yourself and keep him feared and slowed while your pet does
>the dirty work.
>
>>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
>tolerated



Dave Karpman davek@...
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

The demon is a liar. He will lie to confuse us. But he will also mix lies
with the truth to attack us. The attack is psychological, but powerful. So
don't listen, remember that, do not listen.

- "The Exorcist"
